name: Gimme Bright
overview: We control an apprentice magician who, due to a mistake by the fat people, has left the world of the Rainbow without its characteristic colors. His teacher, the royal sorcerer, has ordered him to repair the damage by going through each area of the country and painting all the predominant terrain in them in color. He has the help of some magic stars of various colors that will provide him with some aids, from momentary immunity to extra lives or an instant repaint of the entire area on screen and others.
